channel.title: HELP! Ive tried everything. This pops up when i run server
channel.description:
Every time I try to add a drop for an npc, I get this error.
Loading npcs... drops... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatExce ion: For input string: "7399 1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:1303) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:502) at server.main(server.java:96)

item.title: HELP! Ive tried everything. This pops up when i run server

yupp. ima dumbass. thank you for reminding me
